title: Error in Training
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description

I am trying to train a model but getting unexpected error and training stopped.

### Operating System

windows 10

### DeepLabCut version

dlc version 2.2.1

### DeepLabCut mode

single animal

### Device type

gpu

### Steps To Reproduce

_No response_

### Relevant log output
